metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4600 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) Help Desk 2.4.x before 2.4.14, 3.0.x before 3.0.16, and 3.1.x before 3.1.10, when Firefox or Opera is used, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an e-mail message body with nested HTML tags.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 5.0.7-1
otrs2 - 5.0.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.7-1').
